page.original:
&ltOBJECT>.NAVIGATOR() Syntax &ltOBJECT>.NAVIGATOR() Description The &ltOBJECT>.NAVIGATOR() method applies to:
Browses (for &ltOBJECT> use either the &ltBROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for &ltOBJECT> use either the &ltFORM> pointer or the name of the form) The &ltOBJECT>.NAVIGATOR() method displays the Goto which field? dialog box. Limitations Desktop applications only. Example The following example displays the Goto which field? dialog box. When the operator makes a selection, it displays the form and sets focus to the selected control.
dim ptr as P ptr = form.load("Invoice") ptr.Navigator()
See Also Form Functions and Methods, Browse Functions and Methods
